title: How to use the right word in academic writing - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing is all about given them what they want. Even in academics there are similarities to the real world: if writing for an English class, use the king’s English, and all the Strunk and White advice.Writing for a technical crowd might allow obscure jargon, acronyms, equations and other info data.Writing for history requires research, making educated guesses based on collating proven factswriting for a business teacher will vary on the topicIn every case, give the professor exactly what they want. Just keep in mind most of it is useless i the real world if you ever mix two different fields. For example, writing advertising g or marketing in the kings English is a guaranteed fail.
